DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Studying sample urine blood patient cancer laboratory may help doctor learn change occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This study look urine blood sample woman newly diagnose breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Studying Urine Blood Samples Women With Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To determine association genotype 4 metabolic enzyme ( e.g. , CYP1A1 , GSTM , GSTT , GSTP ) woman newly diagnose breast cancer play key role metabolism environmental human carcinogen risk breast cancer development . OUTLINE : Urine blood sample collect DNA , mutation , polymorphism analysis . The biological sample may store used future research . Patients complete Baseline Questionnaire collect basic risk/exposure information , include demographic factor ( e.g. , age , weight , height , body mass index ) , menstrual/reproductive history , medical history , medication use , smoke history , alcohol consumption , exposure chest x-ray , family history breast cancer first-degree relative . Patients also complete Second Hand Smoke Questionnaire collect information cigarette smoke history second hand smoke exposure Food Frequency Questionnaire collect information frequency use specific fruit vegetable ( e.g. , cruciferous vegetable ) estimate usual dietary intake 33 nutrient past year ( e.g. , total fat , saturate fat , oleic fat , linoleic fat , carbohydrate , protein , vitamins [ e.g. , A , B1 , B2 , niacin , B6 , folate , C , E ] , mineral [ e.g. , calcium , magnesium , iron , zinc ] , electrolytes [ e.g. , sodium potassium ] , dietary fiber ) . Patients ' medical chart also review collect information age , gender , ethnic background , medical history , medical care .
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnose breast cancer Planning undergo diagnostic biopsy surgery Must tumor tissue available Hormone receptor status specify More 6 month since prior chemotherapy radiotherapy Pre postmenopausal Psychiatric history would preclude give informed consent
